title: ‘DSI Tyres’ shines at SLIM Awards 2021
body_lines: DSI Tyres has marked a historical win against companies from a wide range of industries and fields, by winning the “Local Brand of the Year 2021” Silver Award and “Product Brand of the Year 2021” Bronze Awards at the SLIM Brand Excellence award ceremony and the Silver Award for “Best SEO/SEM Campaign” and the Bronze Award for “Best Digital Marketing Campaign in Automotive/Industrial Manufacturing” at the SLIM DIGIs 2.1 Awards ceremony. DSI Tyres has previously won a number of SLIM Brand Excellence and SLIM DIGIs Awards. The SLIM Brand Excellence and SLIM DIGIs award ceremonies are considered to be the most competitive and prestigious brand awards ceremonies in Sri Lanka. Managing Director of DSI Tyres, Kavinda Rajapaksa, received these awards at grand ceremonies held at the Monarch Imperial Hotel in Jayewardenepura Kotte recently.

DSI Tyres’ role as a leading local tyre manufacturing company that continues to promote its brand in an eco-friendly manner through the use of state-of-the-art technology and continuous research and development which enables them to identify customer needs in a timely manner is the key reason behind its continuous achievements. DSI tyres are becoming increasingly popular in the online sphere as well, due to the facilitation of in-house tyre installation following online orders at the convenience of customers as well as the use of attractive digital marketing.
